meaningMnemonic: Something you <radical>say</radical> to someone you <radical>become</radical> attached to should be said with <kanji>sincerity</kanji>. You need to speak with sincerity when you say things to someone who will eventually become your significant other, for example.
readingMnemonic: When you say something with complete, unabashed <kanji>sincerity</kanji> your special <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい) starts to pulse with the beating of your heart. It shows the person you want to become close to that you truly are sincere!
